tagline: HTML Slide presentation based on backbone and jquery
body: ### Welcome to HTML Slide This is a simple application built on backbone and jquery for making presentation slides on HTML.If you don't have MS PowerPoint , you can use this. ### Prerequisites * jQuery * backbone * underscore * handlebars Please have little knowledge on these frameworks for easy understanding. ### HTMLSlide API's and Slide Template #### API `createSlide` : This will create & returns backbone view for the slide. Parameters (as JSON object): * **slideClass** - css classname for slide main div, * **header** - title appears on top of the slide, * **sectionClass** - css classname for the content div of the slide, * **slideTemplate** - HTML template for the slide , * **content** - content of the slide ( HTML, text, image) returns : Backbone view of a Slide `createSlidePoints` Parameters: * **pointsArr** - Array of strings ( points ), * **SlideView** - Object returned with this 'createSlide', returns : undefined #### Template ### How to create Slide Load the htmlslide.js as part of the prerequisites. It will return you the HTMLSlide class to the window object. Create a instance of it by passing the html element present in your dom. Use the //Slide 1 var htmlSlide = new HTMLSlide($('.slides')); var slide1 = htmlSlide.createSlide({ slideClass : "current", header : "", sectionClass : "middle", slideTemplate : slideTemplate, content : '
